channel.title: Serving Donuts Podcast
channel.itunes:author: The Donut Brothers
channel.description: The Donut Brothers, Jim, Scott and friends talk about the week.
channel.itunes:summary: The Donut Brothers, Jim, Scott and friends talk about the week.

item.title: ServingDonuts043
item.itunes:author: The Donut Brothers
item.description: Isabella (who speaks for all women), and she's ready to give Scott and Jim the lowdown on romance from the woman's point of view.
item.itunes:subtitle: Isabella (who speaks for all women), and she's ready to give Scott and Jim the lowdown on romance from the woman's point of view.

item.title: ServingDonuts042
item.itunes:author: The Donut Brothers
item.description: Enjoy the audio magic as Scott and Jim tackle society's burning topics - like selling baby names on Ebay, Doctors who don't know when to shut their donut hole, Nebraska Whaling, the secret to men, and how to get a really expensive speeding ticket.
item.itunes:subtitle: Enjoy the audio magic as Scott and Jim tackle society's burning topics - like selling baby names on Ebay, Doctors who don't know when to shut their donut hole, Nebraska Whaling, the secret to men, and how to get a really expensive speeding ticket.

item.title: ServingDonuts041
item.itunes:author: The Donut Brothers
item.description: Hear headline busting news stories about fat men with guns, nurses who aren't really nurses, people who can't help putting fruit in beer, and the ecological joys of peeing in the shower.
item.itunes:subtitle: Hear headline busting news stories about fat men with guns, nurses who aren't really nurses, people who can't help putting fruit in beer, and the ecological joys of peeing in the shower.
